title: Interpretation of a dream about putting a menstrual pad in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about putting a menstrual pad in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about putting a pad in a dream. It is one of the dreams that many people wanted to know the interpretation of. By diligent scholars seeking to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about putting a menstrual pad in a dream Seeing menstrual pads in a dream may indicate a disease that the dreamer may be suffering from and will be treated by the grace of God. Using sanitary pads in a dream may indicate committing some sins and disobedience and the dreamer must repent to God Almighty. Whoever sees in her dream that she is putting menstrual pads in a dream, it may indicate the wrong actions that she is doing and she must stop doing so and seek help from God, the Blessed and Most High. Seeing healthy fruits in a dream may indicate the dreamer's fears and disturbances in his life at this time and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting money in the bank in a dream Putting money in the bank in a dream may indicate new projects that the dreamer will enter during these days. If one sees money in the bank in a dream, it may indicate new events and a different stage that the dreamer is entering during that period and God knows best. It is possible to see in a dream that he is putting money in the bank, indicating the changes that will occur in his life during the coming period and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting clothes in a suitcase in a dream Putting clothes inside a suitcase in a dream can indicate the stability that a person feels during this time thanks to God. If one sees his clothes in a suitcase in a dream, this may indicate the new movements that occur in the dreamer's life during this period, and God knows best. Dreaming of putting clothes in a suitcase in a dream can indicate the happy events that come to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing clothes put inside a suitcase in a dream indicates happiness and joyful events that come to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. The dream of dropping a drop in a dream may indicate positive changes that occur to the dreamer in his life in those days, thanks to God. Whoever sees in his dream that he is putting a drop in his eye, this may indicate success in achieving the desires and dreams of those days, thanks to God. Seeing eye drops in a dream may indicate the achievement of ambitions and goals during this time, and God knows best. The person who puts his hand on his head in a dream may indicate the presence of good people in the dreamer's life, thanks to God God. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a person putting his hand on his head in the dream, it may indicate the joys that come to the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. title: What is the animal whose blood is purified in a dream?

preview.html: The animal whose blood is purified in a dream is one of the distinctive puzzles that draws the attention of the listener to it and makes him think seriously about finding the appropriate solution for it, and once again washing it; Because blood is considered unclean and unclean, but the puzzle in our hands is a bit strange. What is the animal whose blood becomes pure in a dream? We will answer it in the following lines. If an animal changes its blood, it becomes pure. The animal whose blood becomes pure is the deer, knowing that the blood of a deer is known. It is as impure as any other animal blood. Which lives in the tropics, forests and pastures, and everyone loves it, but it is afraid when people approach it, and people can eat deer, but its price is remarkably high. How does deer blood change? Musk is extracted from deer blood and musk is considered one of the perfumes that many love and helps to relax The body. Kings used it on the leg and put it in golden or silver vases and placed it in the palace. It gives a beautiful scent. Musk is extracted from the female deer and is one of the most expensive types of musk. The animal that does not drink waterThe animal that does not drink water is the wild kangaroo, and this animal lives in the Australian desert. He cannot drink water, and although he lives in the desert, he does not drink water and weighs about 60 to 70 kilograms. The kangaroo drinks water and dies, and this shock some scientists forced him to drink water and the result was death. There are many complex riddles that catch the attention of the recipient when he hears them and makes him search until he gets the correct answer to them. Among these riddles is the animal whose blood becomes pure in the dream, and the answer is Deer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a lion in a dream, the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, the man who eats the meat of the big white lion attacks me, attacks me, the pet lion chases me in the house by Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a lion in a dream. A lion in a dream is a sultan, omnipotent, omnipotent. Power, because of the greatness of his danger, the seriousness of his audacity, the evil nature of his personality, and the strength of his anger. It indicates the misappropriation of the oppressor by the man and the unjust enemy. Whoever sees a lion entering a house, if he is sick inside it, he will perish, otherwise the power of authority descends upon him. The lion is the city, it is an epidemic, distress, authority, tyranny, or the enemy that afflicts them according to its characteristics in their wakefulness and sleep, unless he enters the mosque and rises above the pulpit; Because he. It is a force that oppresses people and causes them suffering and fear of it. Whoever rides on a lion embarks on a great matter and a grave deception, either in a dispute over the Sultan and making a bridge over him and deceiving him, or riding on the sea without his son, or befalling something like this. He cannot advance or delay, so the outcome of his matter can be deduced from his excessive sleep and his evidence. Authority is tyrannical and tyrannical. Likewise, if a lioness drinks, then eating the meat of the lioness will befall a great sultan and king, and the lion’s skin is the enemy’s money and the lion’s head. Cut off. Whoever sees lions grazing for the right of mighty kings, and whoever is killed by a lion will suffer from a fever, for the lion has a fever, and whoever comes into contact with a lion while he is resisting it will be safe from it. The evil of his enemy, enmity arises between them, and friendship is strengthened. The transformation of the lion became unjust as it was said by the lioness Bint Malik (and it was narrated) that a man came to Muhammad ibn Sirin and said: I saw a lion cub in my hand and I was hugging it. About the princes, the man said: Yes, by God, a man came to Ibn Sirin and said: I saw that I took a lion and put it in my house. He said: It is suitable for some kings. Yazid bin Al-Muhallab saw on the day it was revealed on the authority of Yazid bin Abdul-Malik that he was wearing a lion in his pajamas. The presence of a lion in a dream in general can indicate the presence of thieves or a traitor in the life close to the dreamer, and in some cases it can indicate falling into a problem, great difficulty and difficulty. In the position of the dreamer. Interpretation of a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The lion symbolizes the traitor and the enemy. The lion is good and the person should see himself sleeping with the lion because this vision indicates recovery from illness if the person is sick. The death of a lion on a person in a dream without the lion seeing that person indicates salvation and eating meat. A lion in a dream means that you get money from an enemy, and whoever eats a lion’s head will gain prestige or power, and whoever dreams of marrying a lioness (female lion), this is an escape from distress and trouble. Seeing a person as if he is fighting a lion and not killing it, this indicates a serious illness. Riding a lion feels fear. Disaster. The entry of lions into the country indicates diseases and epidemics, or severe oppression and injustice that will befall the dreamer. The lion portends death and misfortunes. The lion symbolizes the injustice that will befall the dreamer if someone sees the lion entering his home, or the danger of illness, or the traveler’s journey and exile, or something that is not good. Riding a lion With the will and approval of the lion, it means victory and salvation from an enemy, hater, jealous person, or...

title: I dreamed that the doctor said that you were pregnant

preview.html: Today we will learn about the comprehensive interpretation of one of the common visions among women and girls, which is pregnancy, through the interpreter, so stay with us. I dreamed that the doctor said that you are pregnant in a dream. This vision is expressed in the dream of a married woman or who was married in the past. In many positive matters related to the comfort of her heart and mind. This vision in the dream of a married woman and a pregnant woman shows God’s mercy, which includes the worship of the sick and counted, and that what the dreamer desires will be fulfilled for her, God willing. As in the dream of a divorced woman and a widow, this dream indicates ease of things and a feeling of peace. As well as confirmation after a long period of sadness and pain. And suffering. The unmarried girl who was told by the doctor in a dream that she is pregnant. Soon she will hear good news and she may have a surprise that will change her life. The dream indicates that the doctor says that you are pregnant in a dream. In general, confidence after a period of doubt and anxiety, and it calms down after several experiences Difficult and exhausting. A man can also see this dream and think that it is just a dream. But this dream warns him of getting out of crises and achieving what he wants and success, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a boy dreaming of a married woman. I dreamed that I was pregnant and fell in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that this vision is Psychological point of view. It expresses fears rooted in the subconscious, which arose as a result of the circumstances surrounding the opinion and the painful experiences experienced. A miscarriage or miscarriage in an unmarried girl’s dream often indicates the approaching of her due date. There are other interpretive opinions that say that a miscarriage is evidence of failure In achieving desires and goals. This vision in a divorced woman’s dream expresses a reconciliation between her and her ex-husband, and life can return between them again, and God knows best. Miscarriage of the fetus in a married woman’s dream is a sign that her fatigue and effort are being wasted to no avail, and God knows best. Miscarriage of the fetus in a married woman’s dream is a sign that her fatigue and effort are being wasted to no avail, and God knows best. A pregnant woman’s sleep is necessarily a warning to her. Take care of her health and consult a doctor if necessary so as not to cause complications. I dreamed that I was pregnant and happy in a dream. I dreamed that I was pregnant and happy in a dream with promising dreams full of optimism and kindness. It symbolizes hearing good news soon, God willing. This vision in a girl’s dream is not The married woman expresses her engagement in the coming period. If she is engaged, the news will be happy that she will get married soon, and God knows best. As for the dream of a divorced woman, this dream indicates entering into new experiences in life. How to forget the painful past with its sad memories, and God knows best. This vision shows the woman’s dream. In general, whether she is pregnant, married, or has never been married, for the sake of goodness, happiness, and pleasant surprises. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy from her lover. I dreamed that I was pregnant from a man other than my husband in a dream. This vision usually expresses a feeling of loss and loneliness, especially in a married woman’s dream. Who suffers from neglect and being away from her husband for long periods. In one dream, pregnancy without a husband is ridiculous. Therefore, seeing it portends an unexpected surprise that will completely change her life, and God knows best. And whoever sees this

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a plane traveling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling by plane in a dream. Traveling is moving from one place to another or from one country to another. Its duration can be short or long. There are many goals or reasons for travel, including entertainment and weather changes. As this is required by psychologists, especially when they are under pressure or tension from a particular topic, some of them go in search of knowledge as well as treatment. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a plane traveling in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about traveling by plane with family. The interpretation of this vision generally indicates the good and benefit that a person gains from seeing this dream. It also refers to a person's relationship and marriage. Below are the most important interpretations related to this dream: This dream indicates the high position that the dreamer will reach. He also obtained a new promotion in his field of work, and also attained a prestigious and high position. The student obtains the highest grades in his studies, and excels in all fields. In addition to So, an unmarried young man is about to marry a well-intentioned girl. In addition, the merchant earns from his trade a lot of money and rewards that he did not expect for a while. It also indicates the stability that a person feels when living with his family. Also, an unmarried girl gets married A simple young man, but God opens the door for him and takes care of him. In addition, she will continue her studies abroad if she continues her studies. See also: Interpretation of a dream about red roses in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about traveling by plane for a married woman. Traveling for pleasure is one of the most important forms of happiness that this woman experiences, and she will It receives visitors who come from afar. These are the interpretations related to this dream: A married woman’s circumstances change for the better when she dreams that she is traveling by plane. You can also overcome many of the problems facing you and reach a solution or result. Her husband will also do his best to provide a decent life for his family and children. In addition, he will find A new job and in a prestigious position that he dreamed of working in. In addition, the pregnant woman will get rid of the pregnancy problems she was going through and she and her fetus will be healthy. Problems will also end in the life of a married woman who lives happily and stably with her husband and family. She will also give birth to good children. Fair and obedient to her. In addition, she constantly suffers from anxiety and fear over a certain issue that concerns her. Her husband is also a generous person with good morals. See also: Interpretation of seeing my daughter in a dream in detail. The dream of traveling by plane with the family for single people. There are major and radical changes occurring in the life of an unmarried girl and this dream It shows a good side to her, as if she is linked to a young man with good morals. We will tell you the most important interpretations related to this dream: An unmarried girl marries someone who appreciates her, respects her, and respects morals. She also feels afraid of a subject that constantly worries and fears her. There are also many positive changes in this girl’s life, and the change is for the better. Moreover, this girl can achieve her dreams and aspirations that she seeks to achieve

title: Interpretation of seeing drinking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see drinking in a dream, drinking after thirst in a dream, seeing drinking from a bottle, dream interpretation of drinking wine and not getting drunk, seeing drinking from Zamzam water, interpretation of drinking wine. Married woman, we drink whenever we feel thirsty in reality, but seeing drinking in a dream has many interpretations and connotations that we will discuss in this article. Interpretation of a dream about drinking by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about drinking after thirst in a dream and evidence of comfort after distress and joy after sadness. Interpretation of drinking from a cup In a dream, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, it indicates the acquisition of a lot of capital and an increase in livelihood. Seeing yourself drinking from a bottle in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a good person and loved by everyone around him. If you dream of seeing yourself drinking from a broken bowl, or Water flowing from it in a dream, this means that the dreamer is in a place that is not worth reaching. Seeing yourself drinking very hot water in a dream indicates fears, sorrows and hardships that the dreamer is going through. Dreaming of drinking hot water in a dream is a cure after an illness, an end to problems and an end to For disagreements.Interpretation of seeing yourself drinking from a dirty cup in a dream, and this is evidence of illness, distress, and poverty.Seeing someone drinking from a well in a dream means joy, pleasure, and happy news.Interpretation of a dream of drinking in another person’s house in a dream indicates obtaining great benefit from this person In fact. If you dream that you are drinking salty sea water in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s bad psychological state. Interpretation of a dream that sees drinking for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about drinking water from the hand of a dead person in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is starting a new life with a new act or with a happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about drinking after thirst in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her marriage and marriage to a suitable person who loves and appreciates her. Seeing yourself drinking from a bottle in a dream for single people is evidence of engagement after a short time with someone you love and want. Interpretation of a dream about drinking turbid water for an unmarried girl, which... It indicates the failure of the marriage and she must be careful in choosing the right person. Interpretation of a dream about drinking for a married woman: A dream about seeing a woman drinking from clean, pure water in a dream indicates that something bad will happen to her family. Interpretation of a dream about drinking from a fresh cup in a dream for a married woman is evidence of an imminent pregnancy. Vision A married woman drinking from her partner’s hand in a dream is evidence of the stability of her relationship with her husband, full of affection and love. A married woman’s dream of drinking turbid and dirty water in a dream is evidence of bad news and the appearance of evil for her. Interpretation of a dream about drinking for a pregnant woman: Seeing one drinking clean water in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates Ease of childbirth and the safety and security of her newborn. Interpretation of a dream about drinking water from a pregnant woman is evidence of the stress of pregnancy and psychological fatigue and what hardships she is going through. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol for a pregnant woman does not indicate the sex of the fetus, whether it is pure or female. title: Seeing fishing in a dream, seeing catching a big fish in a dream, interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream, interpretation of seeing fishing by hand in a dream

preview.html: Seeing fishing in a dream: Fish is one of the foods that are beneficial to the body and rich in protein and other nutrients. Seeing it in a dream carries meanings of goodness, nourishment, and blessings. It is contaminated whether it is caught by hand or a fishing rod. Seeing fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream? The scholars of visions have agreed. Dreams indicate that the interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream has good connotations in most cases, as it is a symbol of courage, God’s satisfaction with His servant, and the satisfaction of need. Seeing fishing in a dream for a married man can be interpreted as a sign of working hard to earn enough money to meet the needs and requirements of the family, It also symbolizes stable financial conditions and halal living. Fishing can be news of urgent trips to the sea for a good business opportunity. In a merchant’s dream, the dream symbolizes obtaining a lot of profits and abundant profits from multiple projects. Seeing a treasure or a pearl indicates The belly of a caught fish indicates the dreamer's offspring. The number of beads can be an indication of the number of children, and pearls are evidence of a good wife with a beautiful and generous nature who will help in managing the household affairs successfully, making their family life happy and easy. Whoever was hungry and hurried to hunt, it will be a sign of a change in the situation to A much better situation than it is now and reaping a lot of benefits. To dream of fishing and getting a large amount of fresh, clean fish indicates the fairness of the dreamer’s children when they grow up, while fishing from the ground is considered unnatural, so it indicates that you are spending money on things that are not An important task and a sign of wasting time and recklessness. If the dreamer catches dead fish, this indicates his inability to achieve goals and feelings of despair, frustration, and a bad psychological state, as the dream indicates that you face many obstacles in real life and for this reason you see a dream of catching dead fish. Fish is considered an unpleasant vision. What is the interpretation of seeing hunting in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation scholars, including Ibn Sirin, are unanimously agreed that hunting in a dream is evidence of a lot of goodness and blessings in all matters of life, beauty and enjoyment of a good psychological state, and it can lead to marriage for single people and pregnancy for married people, success for the student of knowledge and recovery for the patient. Seeing fish and fishing is a common dream in general, but there are some cases that portend evil, such as seeing fishing from a well. It is a sign of anxiety and increasing distress resulting from many trials and difficulties. It is known that a fish emerging from the sea is accompanied by its contractions, and this is something It is normal, but if it does not arise and the dreamer sees it as if the soul is coming out of it, then this indicates the imminent arrival of the desire that he has sought and wanted success for a long time. The fish always comes out of the water alive, but if it comes out dead, this is evidence of the necessity of walking on the right path and the dreamer adhering to his conscience. In any work he does. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. R

title: Interpretation of seeing an office in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an office in a dream through a website. Roy2a.com’s vision of an office is considered one of the most important types of furniture, whether in the field of work and tasks or inside the home. It is necessary for its importance and quality. Seeing an office in a dream The dreamer wonders about the meaning behind his vision and whether its interpretation is promising or disturbing. Ibn Shaheen is for single, married and pregnant women. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a desk in a dream. Seeing a wooden desk in a dream indicates the strength of the dreamer’s personality, his boldness, and the ability to make sound decisions. Seeing a work desk in a dream indicates the effort made by the dreamer who will be rewarded for his work. Seeing a luxurious desk in a dream indicates changes in the life of The person with the vision for the better. Moving from a private professional office to another office indicates a job promotion or job change. Seeing an office with many books in a dream indicates the ideas and knowledge that the dreamer possesses. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dark road in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an office in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing in Dreaming about buying an office refers to the changes that the dreamer will see in his next life. Seeing a messy office in a dream However, the viewer is going through a turbulent time full of confusion, confusion, and anxiety. A tidy office room in a dream indicates the fortuneteller’s intelligence, knowledge, and insight. An office in a dream indicates the strength of determination and the ability to make sound decisions See also: I dreamed of an airport. What does this mean? Interpretation of seeing an office in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an office in one dream is an indication that she has achieved what she wants and seeks to achieve in her future, whether on the personal, practical or academic level. Seeing someone in the office with an unmarried girl in... The dream indicates that he will soon become emotionally involved or have a close work relationship. Seeing a tidy and clean office in a person’s dream indicates that she is sober and stable psychologically and socially. And to see yourself sitting in a luxurious office for individuals in the dream, this indicates her high aspirations for success and excellence. Seeing yourself sitting In an administrative office to hold an important position in any person’s dream, an indication that she has achieved her goals. Interpretation of seeing an office in a dream for a married woman: Seeing an elegant and spacious office in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happy events that she will witness in the near future. A married woman’s dream indicates a luxurious office for changes in her life for the better and her family. And her home. Seeing a handsome man sitting at a married woman’s desk in a dream is a sign of good news coming her way in the near future. Seeing a desk with many books in a dream indicates a married woman who has logical thinking and correct thinking and makes the right decisions in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Unbelievers in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing an office in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing an office in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the stability of her health condition and the safety of herself and her fetus from all harm. Seeing an elegant and clean office in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a state of stability in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Araf in a dream, Aden.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating honey in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating honey in a dream. Islam has praised the great benefits of honey, noting that it contains a cure for all diseases, and that it is an important source of energy that provides the body with the vitality it needs for a full day of tasks and work. Interpretation of a dream about eating honey in a dream can bring good news, while it requires obtaining It has constant bee stings on it. What is the interpretation of drinking honey in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about eating honey expresses a lot of goodness that the dreamer will receive soon, and it will be from a lawful source and he will have a lot of blessing and satisfaction from the Creator. It is also produced by bees, so acquiring it It requires long-term bee stings and harassment, as we mentioned, so this vision expresses obtaining a reward for hard work, exhaustion, and effort. It also indicates the presence of a person who is very close to the dreamer and treats him with a lot of friendliness and tenderness, but in reality he carries a lot of evil in his heart and is waiting for the opportunity. The occasion stings its owner. Interpretation of a dream about eating honey: It indicates that the dreamer fears God for his livelihood, investigates very carefully in considering the source of his livelihood and the source of his livelihood, and completely avoids doubt. Honey is actually a very sweet liquid and contains a high percentage of sugars, so it is also an indicator of the presence of Good supplies and abundance in the coming period. Eating honey also expresses a man who works hard and endures hardships to secure his livelihood and sustenance, and despite his exhaustion, he is happy to sweat and get tired. It is also one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s good behavior and reputation among people, as he is a person with good morals and honesty. And he cares about others. While eating a small amount of honey, it expresses a person who is deceived by appearance and only cares about the person’s outward appearance, which causes him to get into a lot of trouble with one of the fake characters. As for eating it from its source or beeswax, this vision expresses the dreamer’s exit. From a major problem or his salvation from a danger that threatened his life in the past period. But whoever sees himself working in selling honey, this is evidence that God has a lot of money and blessings, but he likes to spend it on charity instead of enjoying it. This last vision may also indicate To the multiplicity of skills possessed by the dreamer, which qualifies him to work in various fields and achieve success in all of them. What is the interpretation of the dream of eating honey by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of the dream of eating honey by Ibn Sirin expresses that the dreamer is one of the few who are satisfied with a little that is halal, and stays away from the many, no matter what they are. Their attractiveness, as long as they are suspicious. It also expresses a personality dedicated to her work, who loves her work and owns its details, so she is distinguished by her good work and mastery of those around her, which attracts people to her. It also indicates the success of the commercial project that the dreamer started recently and achieved a lot of profits and gains in addition to fame in a period of time Short. But in the opinion of Ibn Sirin, selling honey in the markets indicates a personality that carries a lot of positive energy, because it has a strong influence on those around him, and motivates them to work and make an effort. What is the interpretation of eating honey in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? He says

title: Interpretation of the death of a wife in a dream: the meaning of my wife died in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the death of the husband, beloved wife, suitor, single, married, pregnant, divorced, I dreamed that my husband died both, and crying a lot and much more about Ibn Sirin Interpretation of my wife died in a dream Whoever sees that his wife died, he becomes independent and benefits from lawful money The death of the wife in a dream or her death while receiving condolences and walking to her funeral or even burying her may portend in a dream the deterioration of the relationship between the man and his wife, and the dream in this context is a stern warning to the husband, warning him of the consequences of this disagreement that it can lead to separation. Or divorce. God forbid if the husband does not back down from his positions or actions, and this may mean losing a woman in a dream or searching for her, problems and concerns that the dreamer cannot face. Whoever dreams of the death of his wife destroys his industry, and it is said that he will be rich and benefit financially from the solution, and whoever sees that his son has died is saved from his enemy. The death of the wife is heaven and the death of a pregnant woman is one of the best types of good for her. Losing a woman in a dream indicates the problems that will arise between the spouses. Some scholars believe that this vision indicates stability and happiness. Sometimes it indicates calamities and problems. Seeing the loss of a wife in a dream indicates a lack of support and loss of help. Knowing that the wife commits suicide in a dream shows the problems that the dreamer will face. Seeing the return of the wife after her death means that he heard happy and unexpected news and shows the achievement of the goal. Seeing the death of the wife in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into trouble and suffer material and moral losses. And a lot of harm will be required. Seeing talking to the dead wife in a dream indicates the emergence of good from an unexpected place and the emergence of help from unexpected people and they will live in stability. Seeing the loss of the wife in a dream indicates that the dreamer will make a decision to marry and sometimes this vision indicates the presence of undesirable behavior from the wife and for this he will feel some sadness. Psychological interpretation of seeing the loss of a woman in a dream If the person is married, he feels fear of the lack of his love. This vision also shows the internal problems that the dreamer suffers from. The death of the wife's sister in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face work and effort and succeed and his life will be filled with blessings and goodness. And he always found comfort, stability and entertainment in his life. Seeing the death of your lover in a dream is a sign that some things will end in you. Interpretation of my fiancée died in a dream. And whoever sees in a dream that he is engaged or married to a woman and then dies, he takes on a profession, it will not be profitable, and he leaves it after he gets tired and tired in it. I dreamed twice that her husband died - YouTube
